name: Bike Huge Jumps Tracks
description:
Bike Huge Jumps Tracks is modern racing simulation and ultimate stunt dirt bike race game that will allows you tons of different brands of stunts trail bikes to thrill your way. Your goal in this stunt man, stunt racer game, successfully complete several levels, consisting of challenging and dangerous road. Do you think riding bike in a hurdles area with extreme stunts is an easy task? Tune your stunt bike and find right balance while roof jumps.Stunt bike racing simulator offers insane nitro fueled; use nitrous oxide for incredible stunts! This stunt dirt bike racing provides you an opportunity to become a stunner racer with stunts through the dangerous area.
Features;
- Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
- Ultra-Smooth and balancing control
- Unique, rough and challenging stunts
- Multiple Realistic physics based stunt bikes
- Beautiful 3D graphics and environment
- Challenging stunts game-play
- Very easy to play.
